item.description:
Please let me know when you reply whether you will be there at 7:30 and plan to eat. There are so many people now that I am going to make a dinner reservation and see if they will set us up in the lounge or somewhere that we could possible all sit together...I have discontinued the maybe option but please do not let that keep you from coming. If you respond for dinner please be considerate and and let me know if your plans change at the last minute. Feel free to email me with any questions or concerns. Thanks, Sandy
Get ready to dance, dance, dance!!! ;-)

Four on the Floor will be playing back at the Princeton tonight...
7:30 - meet to eat, greet and get to know everyone
9-12 - dance, dance dance to a great band!!!
lot's of fun if you haven't had the pleasure!
see you there!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dancing with Four on the Floor at the Princeton
